set(PACKAGE_NAME SUNDIALS)
set(PACKAGE_VERSION 5.8.0)
set(PACKAGE_REPOSITORY sundials)
set(GIT_TAG v5.8.0-libopencor)
set(RELEASE_TAG v5.8.0-libopencor)
set(INSTALL_DIR ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/${PACKAGE_NAME})

set(ARKODE_STATIC_LIBRARY lib/${CMAKE_STATIC_LIBRARY_PREFIX}sundials_arkode${CMAKE_STATIC_LIBRARY_SUFFIX})

set(SHA1_FILES
    ${ARKODE_STATIC_LIBRARY}

    ${SUNMATRIXDENSE_STATIC_LIBRARY}
    ${SUNMATRIXSPARSE_STATIC_LIBRARY}
    ${SUNNONLINSOLFIXEDPOINT_STATIC_LIBRARY}
    ${SUNNONLINSOLNEWTON_STATIC_LIBRARY}

# Either retrieve or build our package.

if(LIBOPENCOR_PREBUILT_SUNDIALS)
    if(WIN32)
        if(RELEASE_MODE)
            message(">>> Retrieving SUNDIALS...")
        else()
            message(">>> Retrieving SUNDIALS...")
        endif()
    elseif(APPLE)
        message(">>> Retrieving SUNDIALS...")
    else()
        message(">>> Retrieving SUNDIALS...")
    endif()
else()
    ExternalProject_Add(${PACKAGE_NAME}
        GIT_REPOSITORY
            https://github.com/opencor/${PACKAGE_REPOSITORY}
        GIT_TAG
            ${GIT_TAG}
        GIT_SHALLOW
        CMAKE_GENERATOR
            ${CMAKE_GENERATOR}
        CMAKE_ARGS
            ${CMAKE_ARGS}
            -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=OFF
            -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=${INSTALL_DIR}
        BUILD_BYPRODUCTS
            ${INSTALL_DIR}/${ARKODE_STATIC_LIBRARY}
            ${INSTALL_DIR}/${CVODE_STATIC_LIBRARY}
            ${INSTALL_DIR}/${CVODES_STATIC_LIBRARY}
            ${INSTALL_DIR}/${GENERIC_STATIC_LIBRARY}
            ${INSTALL_DIR}/${IDA_STATIC_LIBRARY}
            ${INSTALL_DIR}/${IDAS_STATIC_LIBRARY}
            ${INSTALL_DIR}/${KINSOL_STATIC_LIBRARY}
            ${INSTALL_DIR}/${NVECMANYVECTOR_STATIC_LIBRARY}
            ${INSTALL_DIR}/${NVECSERIAL_STATIC_LIBRARY}
            ${INSTALL_DIR}/${SUNLINSOLBAND_STATIC_LIBRARY}
            ${INSTALL_DIR}/${SUNLINSOLDENSE_STATIC_LIBRARY}
            ${INSTALL_DIR}/${SUNLINSOLPCG_STATIC_LIBRARY}
            ${INSTALL_DIR}/${SUNLINSOLSPBCGS_STATIC_LIBRARY}
            ${INSTALL_DIR}/${SUNLINSOLSPFGMR_STATIC_LIBRARY}
            ${INSTALL_DIR}/${SUNLINSOLSPGMR_STATIC_LIBRARY}
            ${INSTALL_DIR}/${SUNLINSOLSPTFQMR_STATIC_LIBRARY}
            ${INSTALL_DIR}/${SUNMATRIXBAND_STATIC_LIBRARY}
            ${INSTALL_DIR}/${SUNMATRIXDENSE_STATIC_LIBRARY}
            ${INSTALL_DIR}/${SUNMATRIXSPARSE_STATIC_LIBRARY}
            ${INSTALL_DIR}/${SUNNONLINSOLFIXEDPOINT_STATIC_LIBRARY}
            ${INSTALL_DIR}/${SUNNONLINSOLNEWTON_STATIC_LIBRARY}
    )

    create_package(${PACKAGE_NAME} ${PACKAGE_VERSION}
                   ${PACKAGE_REPOSITORY} ${RELEASE_TAG}
                   PACKAGED_FILES include ${SHA1_FILES}
                   SHA1_FILES ${SHA1_FILES})
endif()

# Let others find and use our package.

set(SUNDIALS_ROOT ${INSTALL_DIR} CACHE INTERNAL "${PACKAGE_NAME}'s root directory.")
